title: Function update information
content:
Instead of downloading and attaching images, 
a feature has been added that allows you to simply copy the code and paste it into README. 
This change is simpler and more convenient, 
so we hope you enjoy it.

title: Service Launch
content:
Git TIERS service has been launched.
Please use it a lot.
Please refer to GitHub for more details.
If you have any inconveniences or improvements, please email us.

title: Service development in progress
content:
Development of the Git Tier service is in progress.
We ask for your interest.
